videos.title: FOOTBALL “POINTLESS” QUIZ - ft EGG FORFEIT AND DANCE CHALLENGE!!!

moments.title: I'm slamming this off your head by the way.
moments.description: Aaron gets the highest score of all the other boys in this episode of Pointless, leading to him having to face the wraith of the egg.
After missing out on winning this pointless quiz, Jacob and Calum put their dancing shoes on to this viral Jason Derulo dance trend.

videos.title: FOOTBALL TENABLE QUIZ WITH FORFEITS!

moments.title: Big skinny chicken legs come on!
moments.description: After losing in this OG football tenable video: Calum, Aaron and Jacob must face the forfiet, which this time is wax strips to the legs, hilarity ensues.

videos.title: FOOTBALL TIC-TAC-TOE CHALLENGES WITH FORFEITS!!!

moments.title: Double kill!
moments.description: After losing in Tic-Tac-Toe, Jacob must withstand a red arse from Aaron, but it doesn't go as planned for either party.

moments.title: Fuck you for making me drink this!
moments.description: After losing in Tic-Tac-Toe, the boys cook up a concotion that Aaron must drink.

moments.title: Let's go girls!
moments.description: After losing in Tic-Tac-Toe again, Aaron must sing as his forfeit, Shania Twain eat your heart out.

moments.title: Feeling hot hot hot!!!
moments.description: After losing in this round of tic-tac-toe, Calum must face his fears and eat this spicy item.
